source_sentence: 暫聞佛所說　　金剛種已成
translation: having heard the Buddha's teaching for a while, the adamantine seed has been formed

source_sentence: 縱未出樊籠　　終超死行處
translation: even if one has not yet escaped from the cage, he will always transcend the place of his deathbed.

source_sentence: 聞法方思義　　如實善修行
translation: hears the teaching and then considers its meaning, correctly and skillfully cultivates it

source_sentence: 次第三慧圓　　餘教皆無此
translation: followed by the third perfection of wisdom, which is not found in any of the other teachings

source_sentence: 唯獨牛王仙　　妙契真圓理
translation: Only the Sage Ox-Horse King has understood the true and perfect principle

source_sentence: 斯教不勤修　　寧有怨過此
translation: If this teaching is not practiced diligently, how could there be any complaint beyond this?

source_sentence: 暫聞除渴愛　　邪見信心生
translation: hearing for a moment removes craving, and wrong views and faith arise

source_sentence: 聽者發喜心　　依斯具淨戒
translation: listeners become happy and rely on this full set of pure precepts

source_sentence: 誕應時咸喜　　成長世皆歡
translation: all rejoice at the time of birth, and all rejoice in the world when they grow up

source_sentence: 大化利群生　　示滅興悲感
translation: greatly transforming sentient beings for the benefit of all, demonstrating a sense of compassion for the extinction of suffering

source_sentence: 讚詠除眾毒　　憶念招欣慶
translation: to praise and sing to remove all poisons, to remember and bring joy and happiness

source_sentence: 尋求發慧明　　解悟心圓潔
translation: to seek to awaken the wisdom and insight of the enlightened mind and perfect purity

source_sentence: 遇者令尊貴　　恭侍勝心生
translation: those who meet them make them honorable, and their respectful service gives rise to a superior attitude

source_sentence: 承事感福因　　親奉除憂苦
translation: to acknowledge the causes of merit and devote oneself to the removal of sorrow and suffering

source_sentence: 尸羅具清潔　　靜慮心澄寂
translation: Śīlâditya is fully cleansed, and the mind is clarified in meditation

source_sentence: 般若圓智融　　恒沙福所集
translation: perfect interpenetration of wisdom and the merit accumulated in the constellation

source_sentence: 尊容及尊教　　及尊所證法
translation: honored countenance and honored teaching and the teaching realized by the honored one

source_sentence: 見聞思覺中　　此寶最殊勝
translation: among views, sounds, cognition, and perceptions, this jewel is most excellent

source_sentence: 漂流作洲渚　　害己恒為護
translation: drifting like a shoal, always guarding harm to oneself

source_sentence: 怖者作歸依　　引之令解脫
translation: to take refuge in those who are afraid and lead them to liberation

source_sentence: 淨戒成妙器　　良田生勝果
translation: the pure precepts become a marvelous vessel, and the good soil produces excellent results

source_sentence: 善友能饒益　　慧命由此成
translation: a good friend can give benefit, and thus the life of wisdom is formed

source_sentence: 行恩及和忍　　見者咸欣悅
translation: to practice kindness and forbearance, which brings joy to all who see it

source_sentence: 廣集仁慈心　　功德無邊際
translation: to gather together a benevolent heart, whose merit knows no bounds

source_sentence: 身口無過惡　　愛敬由之生
translation: no faults in body or speech, from which affection and respect arise

source_sentence: 吉祥眾義利　　咸依善逝德
translation: all auspicious features and benefits rely on the virtue of Sugata

source_sentence: 導師能善誘　　墮慢使翹勤
translation: a guide who is able to skillfully guide, and who falls into conceit and makes one work hard

source_sentence: 等持調曲心　　迷途歸正道
translation: equipoise and adjust the twisted mind, and return to the right path after having lost the way

source_sentence: 善根成熟者　　駕馭以三乘
translation: Those whose roots are ripe for virtue drive through the three vehicles.

source_sentence: [怡-台+龍]悷不調人　　由悲故暫捨　於遭厄能設　　安樂勸善修　悲愍苦眾生　　利樂諸群品　違害興慈念　　失行者生憂　暴虐起悲心　　聖德無能讚　恩深於罔極　　舉世所咸知　於此返生怨　　尊恒起慈愍　亡身救一切　　自事不生憂　於諸崩墮人　　親能為援護　二世行恩造　　超過諸世間　於闇常照明　　尊為慧燈炷　人天所受用　　隨類有差殊　唯尊正法味　　平等無差別　不觀於氏族　　色力及年華　隨有善根人　　求者皆蒙遂　廣現諸希有　　無緣起大慈　聖眾及人天　　合掌咸親近　嗚呼生死畏　　佛出乃光暉　饒益諸眾生　　皆能滿其願　惡人與共處　　摧樂取憂危　謗惱害其身　　猶如受勝德　為物行勤苦　　曾無染著心　世尊希有德　　難以名言說　尊遊嶮惡道　　馬麥及牛鏘　苦行經六年　　安受心無退　尊居最勝位　　悲愍化群生　縱遇輕賤人　　身語逾謙敬　或位尊貴主　　曾無憍慢心　屈己事眾生　　卑恭如僕使　機情億萬種　　論難百千端　如來慈善音　　一答疑皆斷　恩深過覆載　　背德起深怨　尊觀怨極境　　猶如極重恩　怨於尊轉害　　尊於怨轉親　彼恒求佛過　　佛以彼為恩　邪宗妬心請　　毒飯與火坑　悲願化清池　　變毒成甘露　以忍調恚怒　　真言銷謗毀　慈力伏魔怨　　正智降邪毒　群迷從曠劫　　習惡以性成　唯尊妙行圓　　一念翻令善　溫柔降暴虐　　惠施破慳貪　善語伏麁言　　唯尊勝方便　難提摧巨慢　　鴦掘起慈心　難調能善調　　誰不讚希有　唯尊聖弟子　　法味自怡神　草座以為安　　金床非所貴　善知根欲性　　攝化任機緣　或有待其請　　或無問自說　初陳施戒等　　漸次淨心生　後談真實法　　究竟令圓證　怖畏漂流處　　唯佛可歸依　勇猛大悲尊　　拯濟諸群品　身雲遍法界　　法雨灑塵方　應現各不同　　隨機故有異　善淨無違諍　　唯尊可承奉　廣利諸人天　　咸應興供養　身口無起作　　善化遍群方　所說妙相應　　此德唯尊有　久修三業淨　　妙瑞現無邊　普觀諸世間　　曾無此勝德　況於極惡者　　純行最上悲　廣利諸眾生　　勇猛勤精進　聲聞知法者　　於尊恒奉事　設使證涅槃　　終名為負債　彼等諸聖眾　　為己而修學　由捨利生心　　不名還債者　無明睡已覺　　悲觀遍群方　荷負起翹勤　　聖善宜親近　魔怨興惱害　　佛力已能除　無畏功德中　　斯但顯少分　悲心化一切　　聖意絕希求　利樂無不施　　能事斯皆畢　如來勝妙法　　若或可遷移　調達與善星　　不應投此教　無始流轉中　　互為不饒益　由斯佛出世　　開示化眾生　鹿苑度俱隣　　堅林化須跋　此土根緣盡　　更無餘債牽　法輪久已轉　　覺悟諸群迷　恒沙受學人　　皆能利三有　以勝金剛定　　自碎堅牢身　不捨於大悲　　自化猶分布　二利行已滿　　色法兩身圓　救攝一闡提　　雙林顯佛性　悲心貫三有　　色像應群方　粟粒以分身　　爾乃居圓寂　善哉奇特行　　希有功德身　大覺諸法門　　世所未曾有　流恩遍含識　　身語恒寂然　凡愚背聖恩　　於尊興謗怒　法聚寶藏真無際　　德源福海實難量　若有眾生曾禮尊　　禮彼亦名為善禮　聖德神功無有盡　　我今智劣喻微塵　欲讚如來功德山　　望崖怯退由斯止　無量無數無邊境　　難思難見難證理　唯佛聖智獨了知　　豈是凡愚所能讚　一毫一相充法界　　一行一德遍心源　清淨廣大喻芳池　　能療眾生煩惱渴　我讚牟尼功德海　　憑斯善業趣菩提　普願含生發勝心　　永離凡愚虛妄識一百五十讚佛頌
translation: [Yi-tai+long] sorrowful and unregulated people Because of pity, he temporarily abandons those who are afflicted by calamities, encourages good cultivation, pities suffering beings, brings joy to the masses, harms those who are disillusioned, generates compassionate thoughts, and is unable to praise noble virtues that are beyond measure, as all people in the world know. Here, resentments arise, the honored one always arouses compassion, his body falls to the rescue of all others, his own situation doesn't give rise to sorrow, and those who have collapsed are personally able to defend those who have acted with kindness in the two worlds. Beyond all worlds, the honored one always illuminates in the darkness, honored as the burning lamp of wisdom, and is accepted by humans and gods. There are differences in types, but the honored one has the right taste of the Dharma, equality, and no distinctions.
